statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.description: Joseph Chartouny had 15 points, 10 rebounds and five assists, and Fordham cruised to an 84-58 victory over Colgate on Tuesday night.
article.headline: Fordham cruises to 84-58 victory over Colgate
article.linkText: Fordham cruises to 84-58 victory over Colgate
article.story: NEW YORK -- Joseph Chartouny had 15 points, 10 rebounds and five assists, and Fordham cruised to an 84-58 victory over Colgate on Tuesday night. Ryan Rhoomes scored 18 points on 8-of-10 shooting to lead the Rams (3-1). Mandell Thomas had 17 points with five assists, and Christian Sengfelder chipped in 13 points. Tom Rivard had 11 points for Colgate (1-3). Alex Ramon and Jordan Swopshire added eight points apiece, and Austin Tillotson had four points with seven assists. Swopshire made a layup to pull the Raiders to 24-22 with five minute left in the half. The Rams answered with three consecutive 3-pointers by Thomas, Antwoine Anderson, and Chartouny to spark a 14-2 run. Colgate's David Favorite made a 3-pointer just before the half and Fordham led 38-27. The Rams opened the second half on a 14-7 surge and led 52-34 with 14 minutes left. Sengfelder scored six points during the span.
